topic.title: Title
topic.hint: Hint: A single tag should be within 17 characters, choose at least one and up to 7 tags). You can enter text and press `Enter` to create a tag.

vndb.name: VNDB ID
vndb.help: We require that each VN must have a VNDB ID. The VNDB ID needs to be obtained from the VNDB official website (vndb.org) at the top of the page. When entering the page of the corresponding game, the ID in the game page URL (such as https://vndb.org/v19658) is the VNDB ID. After entering the ID, click 'Fetch Data', and the game's title and description (both in English) will be attempted to be retrieved from VNDB.
vndb.info: While you fetch the data, we will automatically check for duplicate entries of the visualnovel.

title.name: Title
title.help: Title is required to have at least one. It's highly recommended to fill in all (If there is no corresponding translation for the game, it can be left blank. English titles can be automatically obtained from VNDB)

introduction.name: Introduction
introduction.help: At least one type of introduction is required. The English introduction can be automatically retrieved by clicking 'Fetch Data', but there is a chance it may not be available. For the Japanese introduction, you can click on the 'DLsite' website at the top of the page to enter the game details page, and the 'ストーリー' section on that page is the Japanese introduction. The Chinese introduction can be obtained from Bangumi or the Moegirl Wiki. You can also discard the official visualnovel description and provide your own introduction to the visualnovel.

banner.name: Banner
banner.help: Please try to capture the original resolution of the VN for the banner image instead of taking screenshots. Avoid including the edges of the device window, and it's preferable for the width to be greater than the height. The preview image will ultimately be resized to a resolution no larger than 1920 × 1080.
banner.hint:
Preview images cannot contain sensitive content such as R18
Preferable for the width to be greater than the height

series.name: Visualnovel Series
series.hint: If there are multiple games, please separate each number with an comma.
series.placeholder: Please enter the game index (site-specific numbers, which can be found in the information section of an individual game page). For example, `Amairo Chocolata 1, Amairo Chocolata 2, Amairo Chocolata 3` is a series, so you would enter `18, 19, 20`.

official.name: Official Sites
official.hint: If there are multiple official websites, please separate each link with a comma
official.placeholder: Please enter the official website link

alias.name: Aliases
alias.hint: Alias can be up to 17 characters long. Press Enter to create an alias.

engine.name: Visualnovel Engines
engine.hint: If there are multiple engines, please separate each engine with a comma
engine.placeholder: Please enter the name of the game engine, for example, KiriKiri, RUGP, Shiina Rio. You can enter multiple.

tags.name: Visualnovel Tags
tags.hint: If there are multiple tags, please separate each tag with a comma.
tags.placeholder: Please enter game tags, such as romance, loli, sister, white hair, white stockings, etc.

report.note: This report is completely anonymous, and no user records will be retained in the management system or the database. Please feel free to report.

agreement.title: User Agreement
agreement.description: 1. All statements made by users are not related to KUN Visual Novel. 2. KUN Visual Novel is merely an open-source collaborative web development project designed for everyone to learn web knowledge. 3. We reserve the right to ban users who engage in actions detrimental to the maintenance of our open-source project. 4. KUN Visual Novel is not responsible for any losses caused by issues such as user account theft.

balance.title: Financial Disclosure
balance.description: KUN Visual Novel's financial disclosure, KUN Visual Novel is a completely free forum. Income comes from donations, and expenses include servers, domains, email services, and image hosting services.

bylaw.title: Bylaws
bylaw.description: KUN Visual Novel bylaws, covering users, topics, and moemoepoints. The goal is to make the forum's operation more transparent; these are not rules, as we do not have strict rules.

category.title: Topic Categories
category.description: Topic categories / sections,visualnovel walkthrough,visualnovel chatting,visualnovel seeking,visualnovel news,visualnovel resources download,visualnovel releases, web,languages,linux,practical,ai,crack,android,adobe,algorithm, anime,comics,music,novel
category.g-walkthrough: Visual Novel Walkthroughs, full CG archives, patches, and downloads related to visualnovels
category.g-chatting: Visual Novel Chats, where you can freely discuss and post anything related to visualnovels
category.g-article: Visual Novel Articles, longer articles about visualnovels, suitable for reflections and thoughts
category.g-seeking: Visual Novel Resource Seekers, for finding and asking about visualnovel resources
category.g-news: Visual Novel News, updates on new translations, dynamic information related to visualnovels
category.g-releases: Visual Novel Releases, news on new game releases from different companies, where to buy them
category.g-other: Anything else related to visualnovels, including games not covered by VNDB
category.t-web: Web, Web app development, JavaScript / TypeScript, Node.js, React / Next.js, Vue / Nuxt, Angular, Solid, Svelte
category.t-languages: Programming Languages, C language, JavaScript, C++ / cpp, Java, Python, Rust, C#
category.t-help: You can ask any questions you have or need assistance with here
category.t-linux: Linux, sudo pacman -Syu, chmod -R 777 /, dd if=/dev/zero of=/dev/sda, alias cd rm -rf ./*
category.t-practical: Practical Technology, visualnovel translation techniques, practical software and website sharing, tips and tricks
category.t-ai: AI, Self-supervised learning, GANs, Quantum Computing, Transformer, Deep Learning, Federated Learning, GNN, Explainable AI, etc.
category.t-crack: Reverse Engineering, Windows Reverse, Android Reverse, IOS Reverse, Vulnerability Exploitation, Black Box Attacks, Data Breach Prediction, DDoS, SQL Injection, xss
category.t-android: Android, Java, Kotlin, RxJava, Jetpack Compose, flutter
category.t-adobe: Adobe, Adobe Photoshop(PS), Adobe Illustrator(AI), Adobe Premiere Pro(PR), Adobe Audition(AU), Adobe After Effects(AE)
category.t-algorithm: Algorithms, Sort, DFS, BFS, A Search, Greedy, Union Find, Hashing, BT, BST, FT, Backtracking
category.t-other: Others, Anything related to the technology you know, limited to medicine, agriculture, engineering, literature, business, cryptography, sociology, management, etc.
category.o-anime: Anime, I love Rito the most in the whole universe! So from now on, I will work hard to make Rito like me too!
category.o-music: Music, せーのっ! でもそんなんじゃ だめ
category.o-daily: Daily Life, Record everyday stories from life
category.o-essay: Personal Essays, Write whatever comes to mind
category.o-forum: Forum Related, Feedback, New Feature Requests, Anything related to this forum

kungalgame.title: About Us
kungalgame.description: KUN Visual Novel is a visualnovel forum that will become a website integrating all things visualnovel, including visualnovel downloads, visualnovel reviews, visualnovel data analysis, visualnovel news, visualnovel translation/internationalization, visualnovel production, and more. Our ultimate goal is to be the world's best visualnovel forum!

login.title: Login / Register KUN Visual Novel Forum
login.description: Login / Register KUN Visual Novel Forum, the world's cutest visualnovel forum! Visualnovel discussions, technical exchanges. Striving to create the best atmosphere! No advertisements ever! Always free!

nonMoe.title: Non-moe Record
nonMoe.description: KUN Visual Novel's records of user violations. This section records all penalties imposed so far. We hope everyone will not engage in such behavior.

pool.title: Topic Pool
pool.description: KUN Visual Novel topic pool, visualnovel discussions, technical exchanges, and other discussions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: KUN Visual Novel privacy policy. KUN Visual Novel is a completely free, ad-free visualnovel forum. We will never use your personal information for anything other than this site. We do not operate for profit. Email, registration time, etc., are used for password recovery. Through cookies, Local Storage, etc., we provide optimized experiences such as search history, image caching. Device date, operating system information, etc.

ranking.title: Rankings
ranking.description: KUN Visual Novel rankings, user rankings, topic rankings, popularity rankings, moemoepoints rankings.

technique.title: Technical Exchange
technique.description: KUN Visual Novel technical exchange. visualnovel cracking, visualnovel translation, visualnovel production, advanced visualnovel. Perhaps you can develop a high-performance visualnovel website. Not limited to visualnovel, we encourage exploration of all technical aspects, such as programming, Adobe series, SAI drawing, Auto CAD mapping, high-tech, rooting, firewalls, servers, DDoS principles.
